caption.center: James T. PALMERTREE and Jerry Palmertree v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Montgomery County; Clarence E. Morgan, Jr., J.
opinion.attorneys:
Hugh L. Bailey, Winona, for appellants.
A.F. Summer, Atty. Gen., by John C. Underwood, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before INZER, P.J., and SUGG and WALKER, JJ.
